name: Swipe for Activator
author: fidele007
description:
Trigger Activator actions through one of the following screen gestures:
  • Swipe Down on Home Screen (native pull-down spotlight gesture)
  • Swipe Down on Lock Screen
  • Swipe Up on Home Screen
  • Swipe Up on Lock Screen
There's an option to disable pull-down spotlight in Settings.

0.0.1-121 (January 27th, 2015): Added Swipe Up gesture on home screen
Added option to disable pull-down spotlight
0.0.1-201 (February 1st, 2015): Disabled home screen gestures on icon editing mode to fix bug where icons can't be moved
0.1-22+debug (2016-09-18): Disable home screen swipe gestures on dock view. This is implemented to resolve conflict with UnderCut tweak which uses the swipe up gesture on the dock view.
0.2.1 (2017-02-09): Fix vibration bug on homescreen swipe up
